dcterms:description: Sotopia is an open-ended environment that simulates multi-turn conversations between language model agents and automatically evaluates their social capability across various scenarios including negotiation, persuasion, and collaboration.
dcterms:title: Sotopia

dcterms:description: Harmbench is a standardized evaluation framework designed for automated red teaming and robust refusal, focusing on assessing the safety and robustness of language models in multi-turn dialogues.
dcterms:title: Harmbench

dcterms:description: HALIE is a dataset aimed at evaluating human-language model interaction, providing insights into the dynamics of dialogue between humans and language models.
dcterms:title: HALIE

dcterms:description: Simulacra is a dataset that focuses on generative agents, providing interactive simulations of human behavior to study and evaluate social interactions.
